img_summary: The image is a screenshot from a video game, showing a combat scene. The player character is engaged in a fight with an enemy named "Gore-Eye Daoist," whose health bar is visible at the bottom of the screen and is partially depleted. The player has two attack options displayed on the left side: "Light Attack 'Earth Shatter,'" which involves striking the enemy three times with a heavy head, and "Heavy Attack 'Mountain Splitter,'" which allows the player to dash forward with full force, with the option to fully charge for a further dash. The game interface includes a health bar for the player and icons for abilities or items in the bottom right corner. The environment appears to be a dark, outdoor setting with a tiled roof structure in the background.
